Containers.Name: DVB-Drivers
Containers.Description: This Plugin will install all necessary modules and dependencies to get your DVB Cards working (currently you have the choice between DigitalDevices, LibreELEC and XboxOne-USB DVB drivers on the settings page). ATTENTION: Please update your 'go' file if the plugin doesn't load the Kernel Module correctly for you DVB card, for more information see the DVB Plugin page.
